price: 31.Firqawni Nabii Muusakmumma yacee marih num tekkek tet baahey kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
